question: any dua or prayer for career
answer:
QUESTION
I would like to know if there is any dua that I can recite or some prayer that I can perform in order to help a friend. One of my friends who has a very good iman and faith in Islam, is 24, but wants a good job. He is for the time being in a job which doesn?t pay much for him. He says he is a self made man and does not want any help, so as I cant help him in any way I would like to help him through any Islamic source. Could u suggest any dua pr prayer that I can perform or also even him so cud u suggest anything.
ANSWER


Share:
1. Surah Waaqi'ah in the 27 Juz of the Qur'aan may be recited after Maghrib
daily.
2. The performance of Fajr Salaat facilitates in acquiring one's sustenance
with ease.
3. Continue making Du'aa after every Salaat - in any language you prefer.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Muhammad Kadwa
FATWA DEPT.

CHECKED AND APPROVED: Mufti Ebrahim Desai
